reviews.review_msg: Such an awesome prof! Dr. Baxter is the perfect mix of knowledgeable and easy-going. She remembers what it was like to be a student in university and keeps the level of difficulty appropriate. Only one midterm, mini assignments, and a final paper. Not hard at all! I recommend taking this class with Dr. B!

Susan was the best prof I had at SFU. She appreciates effort in class and attentiveness. She also talks to you/treats you like adults. If you attend her classes, listen to her feedback on papers, and keep an open mind, you will breeze by in her classes. LOVED every minute of this course.

My favorite class ive taken, ever. You MUST know how to write to do well but everything else is just how well you are at critical thinking and out of the box methods. I was doubtful at first but Susan always was available and interested in helping out.

Great prof, makes the course very interesting because she makes everything up on the spot instead of following slides/notes. She adds a lot of anecdotes from personal experience which make the class very exciting and she's sarcastically funny.

Easiest class I've had by far. Apparently, those who rated terribly seems to have no logic involved nor have writing skills in order to do a satisfactory job. Her stories entertained me in class and questions in the final definitely came from the lectures (I didn't attend all of them). Easy and VERY fair. This class only requires common sense.

Do not take with this Prof. Promotes her own papers as suggested readings! Her critique of class papers suggested and implied class was stupid. Did not follow syllabus and told too many personal experiences "stories" during class. Did not explain odds ratio/relative risk etc. Why is this course a prerequisite? TA's were wonderful.

Susan is a great prof if you have interest in the subject. She doesn't read off power points, she makes it up as she goes along but is genuinely interesting and the class was marked pretty easy. Just do the readings and take notes in class. Serious GPA booster!

this course is a total waste of time. my friend took 130 another semester with another instructor and apparently they learnt much more useful material than what we have learnt. i will not take another course from her again
not a great prof. She's not helpful at all and she marked the final essay really hard. This is an intro to HEALTH SCI class, not english!
wow.. she is so boring! half the stuff she talks about is useless ! i couldn't stand the 2 hour lecture, left at breaks !

horrible horrible prof she's unorganized and not informative. She can spend a whole class talking about stuff irrelevant to the course. totally a waste of time, she doesn't know the course material at all. AVOID her at all cost!!!
